title: Flipped Learning-Based Online Knowledge Structure Analysis Competency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience in language education
context.additional_context: For current elementary school teachers, training in analyzing learner knowledge structures in flipped learning environments. Conducting concept mapping and analysis activities using personal devices in BYOD environments.

learning_goals: Learners can identify knowledge structure patterns (hub, small-scale network, large-scale network) with 80% accuracy by analyzing concept map data collected in flipped learning environments
Learners can classify knowledge structure distributions by learner type into three categories using clustering analysis techniques
Learners can design at least two customized feedback strategies based on learner type classifications
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
